Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2017 08:21PM mushergal wrote: HI there. I have my mammogram and ultrasound right after the other on monday. All my blood work at least what they checked for was normal but dr did feel 2cm lump on my breast and i still have no answer for that spontaenous clear nipple discharge from the same breast I have an indent of my right breast but she didn't say anything aobut it. So I know how it is to wait. It driving me nuts I just want an answer one way or the other. Prayers for you and we all here for you
Posts.Title: Waiting Mountain_Mama mjb1018
